data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Hua-yan, van Achterberg, Cornelis, He, Jun-hua, Xu, Zai-fu (2014): A revision of the Chinese Trigonalyidae (Hymenoptera, Trigonalyoidea). ZooKeys 385: 1-207, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.385.6560, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.385.6560
